With this Close Combat: The Bloody First combines classic Close Combat tactical gameplay with battles fought across a wide variety of diverse 3D landscapes including craggy ridgelines, narrow...

Name: Stellaris: Overlord
description: Realize your Grand Design Overlord, a new full expansion for Stellaris, grants access to new features designed to unlock the next level of your empire. New mechanics to specialize your vassals’ roles within your empire and new magnificent megastructures to project your power further, faster.

Name: METAL SLUG XX
description: METAL SLUG XX, the most recent installment in the famous run-and-gun action shooting series, returns to the battlefield on Steam with a plethora of brand new features!

Name: Northgard - Cross of Vidar Expansion Pack
description: Northgard: Cross of Vidar is a Northgard's expansion pack bringing the second campaign’s story taking place in an entire new civilization: The Southern Kingdoms. This new faction also introduces its proper clan, The Kingdom of Neustria.

Name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance – The Amorous Adventures of Bold Sir Hans Capon
description: The second DLC for Kingdom Come: Deliverance revolves around his attempts to woo the fairest maid he has ever set eyes upon, and his success will not depend only on his own mastery of the art of love – it’s also up to his trusty wingman Henry!

Name: DCS: Combined Arms
description: DCS: Combined Arms gives you control of ground forces during the battle. Use the Command Map to move ground forces, set artillery fire missions, and control the ground battle. Assume the role of a Joint Terminal Attack Controller (JTAC) in multiplayer and designate targets for player-controlled close air support aircraft, or directly...

Name: SnowRunner - Season 1: Search & Recover
description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with Season 1: Search & Recover to discover a wealth of new challenges. This DLC gives you access to two brand new maps in Russia’s Kola Peninsula alongside new vehicles, missions, skins, and more!

Name: Alien Shooter 2 - The Legend
Tags: ['Action RPG', 'Shooter', 'Looter Shooter', 'Post-apocalyptic', 'Action', 'RPG', 'Aliens', "Shoot 'Em Up", 'Inventory Management', 'Gore', 'Survival', 'Sci-fi', 'Singleplayer', 'Horror', 'Female Protagonist', 'Action-Adventure', 'Arena Shooter', 'Isometric', 'Indie', '3D']
description: Meet the completely reworked legendary game loved by millions of players worldwide! Alien Shooter 2 - the Legend is an ambitious follow-up to the famous Alien Shooter series.

Name: The Sims™ 4 Dream Home Decorator Game Pack
Tags: ['Casual', 'Simulation', 'Building', 'Character Customization', 'Immersive Sim', 'Dating Sim', 'Adventure', 'Choose Your Own Adventure']
description: Turn your client’s fantasy into reality in The Sims™ 4 Dream Home Decorator Game Pack*! Every home is full of unrealized potential, and only you can take it from drab to fab.

Name: Steel Division 2 - Burning Baltics
Tags: ['Strategy', 'Action', 'Indie', 'Simulation', 'Historical', 'World War II', 'Real-Time', 'Military', 'Realistic', 'Singleplayer', 'Wargame', 'Replay Value', 'Real-Time with Pause', 'RTS', 'War', 'Co-op', 'Tactical', 'Real Time Tactics', 'Tanks', 'Multiplayer']
description: Lead the Axis to victory in Steel Division 2: Burning Baltics, the History Expansion featuring the German counter-offensive, Operation Doppelkopf. Command 8 new Divisions, including the elite "Grossdeutschland", 120+ new units, 2 new Nations and 2 new Aces!

Name: DCS: South Atlantic
description: RAZBAM Terrain Development proudly presents the South Atlantic map. It is a beautiful, majestic combination of Argentina, Chile, and the Falkland Islands based on the present day.

Name: War Thunder - MiG-23ML Pack
description: MiG-23M fighter-bomber, premium bonuses, 2500 Golden Eagles and 20 days of Premium account - for the most crushing victories in War Thunder!

Name: Hearts of Iron IV: Axis Armor Pack
description: Push through the plains of the Low Countries or the jungles of Burma in style with new 3D unit models of Axis armor units. A total of 53 new armor models are in this pack which, added to the eight tanks available in the German Tank Pack, gives the forces of fascist militarism 61 different armor designs you can see in-game.

Name: Borderlands 3: Psycho Krieg and the Fantastic Fustercluck
description: Explore the chaotic mind of Krieg to search for clues leading to Vaulthalla. Help Krieg process his traumatic memories by blasting his inner demons to bits while trying not to succumb to lunacy.

Name: Steel Division 2 - Commander Deluxe Pack
Tags: ['Simulation', 'Strategy', 'Action', 'Indie', 'Singleplayer', 'Tactical', 'Turn-Based Strategy', 'Multiplayer', 'World War II', 'Realistic', 'Moddable', 'RTS', 'War', 'Co-op', 'Replay Value', 'Real-Time with Pause']
description: Dig into Steel Division 2’s behind-the-scenes, learn advanced tactics & strategies, and complete your Ace & Camo collection with the Commander Deluxe Pack!

Name: Fernbus Simulator - Denmark
description: The danish are considered to be the happiest people in the world. They have their own word for cosiness and that is hyggelig. Perhaps it is the gentle and beautiful landscape that makes the danish people happy. Owners of the Fernbus coach simulator can now find out with the add-on Denmark.

Name: The Sims™ 4 Toddler Stuff
Tags: ['Simulation', 'Adventure', 'Casual', 'Choose Your Own Adventure', 'Character Customization', 'Family Friendly', 'Immersive Sim', 'Dating Sim', 'Life Sim']
description: Give your toddlers new ways to express their personalities, burn off energy, and make friends with The Sims 4 Toddler Stuff.

Name: The Sims™ 4 Romantic Garden Stuff
Tags: ['Simulation', 'Adventure', 'Casual', 'Sandbox', 'Choose Your Own Adventure', 'Character Customization', 'Immersive Sim', 'Dating Sim', 'Life Sim']
description: Build a lush Victorian garden for your Sims to embrace romance and discover a bit of mystery with The Sims™ 4 Romantic Garden Stuff.

Name: Cities: Skylines - African Vibes
description: Influenced by traditional African music, this Radio Station will inspire every city planner with 16 tracks and more than one hour of music.

Name: Temtem - Deluxe Edition Upgrade
description: Show the Airborne Archipelago you’re at the top of your game with the Temcard Brag emote and Top Tamer cosmetic pack. Let the world know you mean business with the Suit Up emote and Stylish Suit cosmetic pack.

Name: Secret Pie Soundtrack
description: This is additional content for Secret Pie, but does not include the base game.

Name: Battlefleet Gothic: Armada 2 - Soundtrack
description: Includes the Battlefleet Gothic: Armada 2 Original Soundtrack with music by Doyle W. Donehoo in MP3 format.

Name: War Thunder - Chinese Starter Pack
description: This Pack includes: Tank M3A3 (1st PTG) (Rank 2 China);Fighter Curtiss Hawk H-81A-2 (Rank 2 China);120000 Silver Lions;Premium Account for 7 days.

Name: Chronos Builder
description: Outstanding 3D procedural powered mapmaking tool for Sci-Fi, Cyberpunk, Victorian, Eastern and Medieval settings. Perfect for TTRPG environments. Create maps, export them and show them on your games!

Name: Magicka 2: Gates of Midgård Challenge pack
description: Three new Challenges - introducing environmental dangers to Magicka 2's Challenge Maps! Hordes of bloodthirsty enemies pour out from mysterious gates in the North, South and East, each with unique environmental dangers! One of the Challenges is truly a challenge – Bragging rights included!

Name: RIFT - Ascended Essentials Pack
description: Experience the full range of RIFT's character creation and create your perfect Ascended with the help of the Ascended Essentials Pack! Play whatever way you want with the help of the Primalist Calling, 23 Souls, 6 character slots per server, and more!

Name: Sheep in Dreams
Tags: ['RPG', 'Action Roguelike', 'JRPG', 'Action', 'Action RPG', 'Roguelike', 'Cute', '2D', 'Anime', 'Adventure', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Female Protagonist', 'Hack and Slash', 'Singleplayer', 'Funny', 'Fantasy', 'Comedy', 'Atmospheric', 'Magic', 'Linear']
description: One day, mysterious sheep began to appear in Hitsuji-chan's house! And strange things happen around everyone in the city... When you dream, you can enter the dream dungeon. Let's capture the dream dungeon and solve the mysterious phenomenon!

Name: Steelrising - Cagliostro's Secrets
description: Uncover the darkest secrets of the King's agent, the Comte de Cagliostro, and seek out the revolutionary Jacques Pierre Brissot.

Name: Park Beyond
Langs: ['English', 'French', 'Italian', 'German', 'Spanish - Spain', 'Arabic', 'Japanese', 'Korean', 'Polish', 'Russian', 'Simplified Chinese', 'Traditional Chinese', 'Portuguese - Brazil', 'Spanish - Latin America']
description: Park Beyond is a theme park simulation game that gives you the freedom to create and manage the Parks of your Dreams! Whether you love to manage finances and visitor experience or just create fun and cosy parks, the game has something in store just for you!

Name: Clickdraw Clicker
description: Clickdraw is an addictive completely RNG western clicker game

Name: Infinite Lagrange
description: Different forces strive to make their own way in the space and desire the control of the Lagrange system- a gigantic transportation network. You, emerging as one of the force leaders, find yourself in a time of challenges and opportunities.

Name: War Thunder - F-5C Pack
description: Northrop F-5C fighter with premium bonuses, 2000 Golden Eagles, 15 days of Premium account - for brilliant aerial victories in War Thunder!

Name: War Thunder - A-10A Thunderbolt (Early) Pack
description: A-10A Thunderbolt attack aircraft, 2000 Golden Eagles, 15 days of Premium account - for an epic air battles in War Thunder!

Name: J.U.R : Japan Underground Racing
description: Beat all opponents in career! Over 200 missions! Oldschool Style! Night street racing atmosphere! Nice and smooth drift physics! Huge amout of Tuning parts!

Name: Aquanox Deep Descent
description: We left the surface of the Earth in ruins, abandoned it and populated the oceans. The sea is now our new home. We call it Aqua. Pilot customized fighter ships and explore a deep sea dystopia torn by the struggle for resources and survival. Enter the unforgiving world of Aquanox Deep Descent.

Name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VI: Khmer and Indonesia Civilization & Scenario Pack
description: The Khmer and Indonesia Civilization & Scenario Pack includes the Khmer and Indonesian civilizations - each with unique civ and leader abilities, a unique unit, and a unique building or improvement. Also included are a new Natural and World Wonder, a new map and an all-new scenario.

Name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous – The Treasure of the Midnight Isles
description: The islands scattered across the dark abyssal ocean hide treasures untold – and horrors unspeakable. Board the grim cursed ship and venture into the unknown to find your fortune... or demise.

Name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Taishi
description: "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi" is the 15th and latest in the historical simulation game series Nobunaga's Ambition. Where a warrior's resolve exceeds their ambition. We offer the grandest warring states experience to all the fans out there!

Name: Realpolitiks II
description: Lead your people to glory and write a new chapter of history in Realpolitiks II, a real-time grand strategy game where you lead any contemporary nation in an attempt to secure world dominance.

Name: Stellaris: Humanoids Species Pack
description: The Humanoids Species Pack adds new gameplay options alongside a selection of new portraits and ship models. Humanoids includes: New Civics - Play as master artificers or decadent hedonists New "Clone Army" Origin New Portraits New Ship Models New Voiceover Sets for VIR New Music Tracks

Name: Ship Simulator Extremes
description: VSTEP and Paradox are proud to announce the next installment of the acclaimed Ship Simulator series. With over 550K copies sold, the series returns to take you into the most extreme conditions on earth… Ever wonder how it feels to sail a half-million-ton supertanker through the perfect storm?

Name: Knight Online
Tags: ['Free to Play', 'MMORPG', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Action', 'Open World', 'PvP', 'Multiplayer', 'Adventure', 'RPG', 'Action-Adventure', 'War', 'Strategy', 'Survival', 'Action RPG', 'Character Customization', 'Casual', 'Fantasy', 'Anime', 'Horror', 'MOBA']
description: The Great Battle between Karus and El Morad has arrived to Steam! Pledge allegiance to one of the Nations and put your skills to the test in one of the best PvP system in the MMORPG universe!

Name: Sniper Elite 5: Rough Landing Mission and Weapon Pack
description: Included in this pack: • Rough Landing Mission • Mosin Nagant rifle • Sjogren shotgun

Name: Prison Architect - Undead
description: Undead brings a whole new scenario to Prison Architect: one where the only objective is to survive! With this new, spooky, expansion wardens will have to fight off the undead attacks to save their inmates and free the prison from an unprecedented catastrophe.

Name: Steel Division 2 - Tribute to D-Day Pack
Tags: ['Strategy', 'Action', 'Indie', 'Simulation', 'World War II', 'Realistic', 'Turn-Based Strategy', 'Real Time Tactics', 'Wargame', 'Replay Value', 'Multiplayer', 'Historical', 'Singleplayer', 'Real-Time', 'Military', 'Moddable', 'RTS', 'War', 'Co-op', 'Tactical']
description: Celebrate Operation Overlord with the Steel Division 2 DLC: Tribute to D-Day. The expansion brings 6 divisions from Steel Division: Normandy 44, including the Polish 1st Armored Division and 3. Fallschirmjäger-Division. Play with units such as the M18 Hellcat, Cromwell, “Beute” Firefly and more!

Name: SnowRunner - Season 5: Build & Dispatch
description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with Season 5: Build & Dispatch. Restore an old TATRA factory in Rostov Oblast, Russia, with two new maps to explore alongside two new TATRA vehicles.

Name: Leave No One Behind: Ia Drang
description: Leave No One Behind is tactical real time strategy war game. Experience some of the hardest battles fought during the Vietnam War in 1965 between US Army and the Army of the Northern Vietnam for landing zones X-Ray and Albany and for Plei Me special forces camp.

Name: AFL 23
description: AFL 23 - IT'S TIME TO FLY!! Feel the Atmosphere, Chase your dreams and Make it your own - in the most realistic AFL game ever!

Name: PAYDAY 2: The Butcher's AK/CAR Mod Pack
description: A large shipment is en route to the East Coast containing mods to the most popular classics – the American CAR and the Russian AK. The Butcher's AK/CAR Mod Pack is the 19th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. The Butcher is looking to gain a market share by providing unique mods for two of the most popular weapon families - and with good reason.

Name: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS - A World Betrayed
description: A World Betrayed portrays a seminal moment in the history of the Three Kingdoms. Many of the iconic warlords of Total War: THREE KINGDOMS have now passed on, a catalyst that has spurred a new generation of warlords into making a play for their own dynasties.

Name: Agony
description: Agony is a first-person, survival horror set in hell. You will begin your journey as a tormented soul within the depths of hell without any memories about your past. The special ability to control people on your path, and possess demons, gives you the measures to survive.

Name: Empire of Sin
description: Empire of Sin is a new strategy game brought to you by Romero Games and Paradox Interactive that puts you at the heart of the ruthless criminal underworld of 1920s Prohibition-era Chicago.

Name: Hunt Down The Freeman
Tags: ['Walking Simulator', 'Souls-like', 'FPS', 'Bullet Hell', 'First-Person', 'Singleplayer', 'Action', 'Shooter', 'Atmospheric', 'Open World', 'Casual', 'Alternate History', "Shoot 'Em Up", 'Dark', 'Military', 'Combat', 'Moddable', 'Level Editor', 'Multiple Endings', 'Parkour']
description: Just another mission, or so you thought… until aliens from another dimension start invading Earth before a scientist with a crowbar hospitalizes you after wiping out your entire squad. Just when you thought you were finished, a man with a briefcase offers you the chance for another beginning.

Name: The Sinking City - Worshippers of the Necronomicon
Tags: ['Action', 'Adventure', 'RPG', 'Violent', 'Gore', 'Narration', 'Choices Matter', 'Conversation', 'Horror', 'Third Person', 'Point & Click', 'Psychedelic', 'Psychological Horror', 'Third-Person Shooter', 'Action-Adventure', 'Atmospheric', 'Realistic', 'Singleplayer', 'Action RPG', 'Visual Novel']
description: Keep the adventure going with this pack of 3 brand-new quests in the oppressive and fantastic world of The Sinking City.

Name: Order of Battle: Allies Resurgent
Tags: ['Simulation', 'Strategy', 'Free to Play', 'World War II', 'Turn-Based', 'War', 'Military', 'Tactical', 'Turn-Based Strategy', 'Historical', 'Turn-Based Combat', 'Wargame']
description: The second of a trilogy of DLCs featuring World War II from the Allied perspective. The new campaign depicts battles in North Africa, the Mediterranean, and finally in Europe from late 1942 to early 1944.

Name: DCS: World War II Assets Pack
description: The DCS: World War II Assets Pack provides numerous World War II air, land and sea assets to populate the Normandy and other DCS World maps with. Eagle Dynamics has spent several years creating an entirely new set of combat vehicles to support DCS: World War II, and each unit is created with an exceptional level of detail and accuracy.

Name: Session: Skate Sim Waterpark & Chris Cole
description: Explore a brand-new map with the latest spots and missions. Your new playground is an old abandoned water park.

Name: Stigmata of Sacrilege
description: Upon her initiation into the Sisters of Exorcism, Sophie is blessed with a sign from the Lord that she is fated to become the next saint. Now, she must overcome her trials for sainthood and seek blessings from various holy sites.

Name: Per Aspera: Blue Mars
description: The Blue Mars DLC introduces players to new, ocean-size bodies of water and all the benefits that come with them! You've changed the face of the Red Planet with the Green Mars update - now let's go for blue!

Name: Battlefield 1 ™ Shortcut Kit: Ultimate Bundle
description: This bundle includes the Shortcut Kit: Vehicle Bundle and the Shortcut Kit: Infantry Bundle for the classes: Assault, Medic, Scout and Support.

Name: Clash of Legions
Tags: ['Casual', 'Strategy', 'RPG', 'Card Game', '2D Platformer', '2D', 'Dark Fantasy', 'PvP', 'Turn-Based Combat', 'Free to Play', 'Artificial Intelligence', 'Singleplayer', 'Online Co-Op', 'Co-op', 'Multiplayer']
description: Clash of Legions is an incredibly fun, fast−paced fantasy tactical Collectible Card .Open booster packs to reveal a variety of cards from 7 different races and build a powerful deck to take to battle. Choose from 1 of 4 unique classes and exploit its unique skill set to your advantage and play−style

Name: MorphVOX Pro 5 - Voice Changer
description: MorphVOX Pro will change your voice online and in-game. Take your voice-changing to a new level with superior voice-learning technology, background cancellation, and sound quality.

Name: Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning - Fatesworn
description: Explore Mithros and the chaos realm in a brand new content expansion that features a raised level cap, new items, enemies and crafting possibilities and lets you face the god of chaos.

Name: Tennis World Tour 2
Tags: ['Sports', 'Tennis', 'Multiplayer', 'Local Multiplayer', 'Singleplayer', 'Artificial Intelligence', 'Character Customization', '3D', 'Third Person', 'Realistic', '4 Player Local', 'Co-op', 'Local Co-Op', 'Online Co-Op', 'Top-Down', 'Split Screen', 'Modern', 'PvP', 'Simulation', 'Management']
description: Play as the world's top players, master each surface, perfect your game and strive to dominate the world circuit. Choose from multiple game modes, with singles and doubles games, local and online.

Name: SnowRunner - Season 4: New Frontiers
description: Elevate your SnowRunner experience to new heights with the New Frontiers expansion! Rebuild an old soviet rocket launchpad in Amur Oblast, a huge new winter region and receive two new vehicles, exclusive skins and cosmetics, and much more!

Name: Train Sim World 2: Hauptstrecke Hamburg - Lübeck Route Add-On
description: Experience regional passenger and heavy freight duties in Northern Germany, linking the country’s 2nd largest city to the commuter towns of Schleswig-Holstein with Train Sim World 2: Hauptstrecke Hamburg - Lübeck.

Name: Hunt: Showdown – The Concubine
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary tool: The Concubine (Hunter), Shahmaran (Sparks LRR), Sister’s Anguish (Hand Crossbow), and Pride’s Death (Heavy Knife).

Name: Gold Hunter
description: Have you always dreamed of searching for gold? Then start your own adventure now - alone or together with friends. Explore a huge map and dig for gold using a variety of methods, vehicles and wash plants.

Name: Richman 11
description: Richman 11 is a casual game in Monopoly genre, it is the 11th episode of the franchise. In the game, players could select maps, characters and group play, creating free play or challenge play. Try to earn money and win the play by investing properties, using cards, etc.

Name: WILD HEARTS™
Langs: ['English', 'French', 'Italian', 'German', 'Spanish - Spain', 'Japanese', 'Korean', 'Polish', 'Simplified Chinese', 'Spanish - Latin America', 'Traditional Chinese', 'Portuguese - Brazil']
description: Master ancient tech to hunt down giant beasts.

Name: Torchlight III
Tags: ['RPG', 'Adventure', 'Action', 'Hack and Slash', 'Loot', 'Action RPG', 'Dungeon Crawler', 'Online Co-Op', 'Isometric', 'Co-op', 'Multiplayer', 'Fantasy', 'Singleplayer', 'Controller', 'Early Access', 'Steampunk', 'Open World']
description: In Torchlight III, Novastraia is again under threat of invasion and it’s up to you to defend against the Netherim and its allies. Gather your wits and brave the frontier to find fame, glory, and new adventures!

Name: ATLAS
Tags: ['Survival', 'Open World', 'Pirates', 'Sailing', 'Adventure', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Crafting', 'Naval Combat', 'Early Access', 'Online Co-Op', 'RPG', 'Multiplayer', 'MMORPG', 'Exploration', 'Sandbox', 'Base Building', 'Action', 'PvP', 'Co-op', 'PvE']
description: Set sail for the ultimate pirate experience! Embark on a grand adventure alongside thousands of other players in one of the largest game worlds ever built (and even claim a piece of it to call your own). Build your ship, assemble your crew, sail the high seas, and become a pirate legend!

Name: Cities: Skylines - K-pop Station
description: Get in the groove with some K-pop tunes! Straight from South Korea, K-Pop Station arrives to energize your city-management skills. K-Pop Station features 16 songs for more than 45 minutes of music!

Name: Mystery Case Files: The Last Resort Collector's Edition
description: A mission to find a group of missing skiers goes downhill fast when a town’s secrets hit the fresh mountain air!

Name: War Thunder - Type 96A Prototype Pack
description: Powerful tank ZTZ96A Prototype with premium bonuses, 2000 Golden Eagles, 15 days of Premium account - for the fire-breathing dragons of War Thunder!

Name: PAW Patrol The Movie: Adventure City Calls
description: Big city, bigger adventure! The PAW Patrol must save Adventure City from Mayor Humdinger’s selfish scheming – and they need YOU on Team PAWsome!

Name: Train Sim World 2: Diesel Legends of the Great Western Add-On
description: Diesel Legends of the Great Western offers an entirely new perspective through the train cabs of yesteryear. An age before HSTs and Turbos; Westerns and heritage slammers reigned supreme and you can take control of these long-gone services in Train Sim World 2.

Name: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles: Tanjiro, Zenitsu, & Inosuke (Entertainment District) Character Pack
description: Tanjiro Kamado (Entertainment District), Zenitsu Agatsuma (Entertainment District) and Inosuke Hashibira (Entertainment District) will become playable characters. Additional content, such as quotes and profile photos, will also be included.

Name: War Thunder - Japanese Pacific Campaign
description: The A6M5 Ko fighter, 850 Golden Eagles, 15 days of Premium account and access to a campaign, which allows you to fight as a pilot in the Imperial Japanese Air Forces against the U.S. Navy in battles of the Pacific Theatre!

Name: PhysDrive
description: PhysDrive is a great physic simulated racing game with a giant map! Go through a big loops, falling blocks, destructible walls, fans, rails, stairs, spikes, traps and more!

Name: Train Sim World® 2: Isle Of Wight: Ryde - Shanklin Route Add-On
description: Experience one of the most unique railway lines in England and climb aboard the country’s oldest operational rolling stock with Rivet Games’ Train Sim World 2: Isle of Wight.

Name: War Thunder - T-72AV (TURMS-T) Pack
description: The Premium export T-72AV (TURMS-T) with 15 days of Premium account and 2000 Golden Eagles - for the inborn War Thunder tankmen!

Name: GOAL! The Club Manager
Tags: ['Early Access', 'Sports', 'Strategy', 'Football (Soccer)', 'Simulation', 'Management', 'Economy', 'Singleplayer', 'Multiplayer', 'Grand Strategy', 'Trading', 'Turn-Based Strategy', 'Turn-Based Tactics', '2.5D', 'Stylized', 'Old School', 'Choices Matter', 'Comedy', 'PvP', 'Minimalist']
description: You are more than a coach. You are the undisputed club boss. Are you ready to dominate the league with your team in this re-imagining of the classic sports management franchise? Could you be the next manager sensation? Prove it!

Name: White Day2: The Flower That Tells Lies - EP1
description: 'White Day2: The Flower That Tells Lies' brings the players back to Yeondu High School. To find out the truth that remained undiscovered in the first installment, players must explore the closed school, investigate bizarre phenomena, avoid possessed policemen, and discover hidden clues.

Name: A.V.A Global
Tags: ['FPS', 'PvP', 'Competitive', 'Shooter', 'Free to Play', 'First-Person', 'Action', 'Military', 'Multiplayer', 'Sniper', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Singleplayer', 'Violent', 'PvE', 'Online Co-Op', 'Sexual Content', 'Co-op', 'Co-op Campaign', 'Strategy', 'Zombies']
description: A.V.A is a classic FPS shooter game featuring various types game Modes. Depending on the battlefield, you can choose Pointman, Rifleman, and Sniper and enjoy strategic team play.

Name: Ghostwire: Tokyo - Deluxe Upgrade
Langs: ['English', 'French', 'Italian', 'German', 'Spanish - Spain', 'Arabic', 'Japanese', 'Korean', 'Polish', 'Portuguese - Brazil', 'Russian', 'Simplified Chinese', 'Spanish - Latin America', 'Traditional Chinese']
description: Face the Unknown with style. The Ghostwire: Tokyo Deluxe Upgrade gives you the versatile Streetwear Outfit Pack or hide in the shadows with the Shinobi Outfit and Kunai weapon skin!

Name: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock: Anabasis
description: Anabasis is the most significant expansion for Battlestar Galactica Deadlock to date, completely revolutionising the game: it introduces a new game mode, Operation Anabasis, and also adds 11 new skirmish maps, 4 new munition types and 12 new resource missions!

Name: Two Point Hospital: Close Encounters
description: Down in the town of Goldpan, rumours persist of an out of this world encounter.

Name: Astride
description: Explore Astride, a horse game set in a Scandinavian-inspired environment.

Name: Bless Global
description: BLESS GLOBAL is a medieval fantasy MMO featuring immersive aesthetics, which depicts a live magical world through grand stories and console-level graphics. The game offers solid battle animation and unfettered mobile combat, bringing an immersive and epic gaming experience to every players!

Name: Virtual Villagers Origins 2
description: Craft, build, farm, breed and solve puzzles in a village right on your computer!

Name: Broken Sword 4 - the Angel of Death
Tags: ['Adventure', 'Casual', 'Indie', 'Mystery', 'Point & Click', 'Singleplayer', 'Puzzle', 'Third Person', 'Atmospheric', 'Story Rich', 'Sequel', 'Action', 'Hidden Object', '3D Platformer', '3D Vision', '3D', 'Cinematic', 'Anime', 'Conspiracy', 'Detective']
description: When a mysterious and beautiful woman rushes into George Stobbart’s office, pleading for help, he cannot know that he will be inextricably drawn into terrifying conspiracy, and a desperate search for a nefarious artifact of great and terrible power. For George, it looks like the world needs saving. Again.

Name: STAR WARS™: The Clone Wars - Republic Heroes™
description: Star Wars The Clone Wars: Republic Heroes lets Star Wars fans young and old live out the sweeping galactic adventures of the Clone Wars. For the first time ever, players can fight as their favorite Jedi and Clone Troopers from the preeminent animated television series

Name: ENDLESS™ Legend - Monstrous Tales
description: Endless Legend - Monstrous Tales delivers a raft of new quest lines, including a separate and unusual multi-part adventure into ancient truths that are nothing less than... monstrous.

Name: Hero Siege - Gates of Valhalla (Collector's Edition)
description: Features Act 8 Expansion and its content as well as a Jötunn Emote, Golden Viking Skin, 2 Hud Styles and 2 Portraits

Name: Operation swat
description: Ever wanted to be a part of a swat team, Where your mission is to rescue hostages? Well now you can be. You and your team of 3, Which you command are a 24/7 emergency swat team.

Name: The Sims™ 4 Bust the Dust Kit
description: Dust off the vacuum and tidy up in The Sims™ 4 Bust the Dust Kit*!

Name: The Highrise
Tags: ['Early Access', 'Survival Horror', 'Open World', 'Crafting', 'First-Person', 'Stealth', 'Open World Survival Craft', 'Exploration', 'Sandbox', 'Survival', 'Horror', 'Atmospheric', 'Action-Adventure', 'Action', 'Post-apocalyptic', 'Adventure', 'Multiplayer', 'FPS', '3D', 'Realistic']
description: THE HIGHRISE is a first-person survival game set in a high-rise building that has been sealed off by an alien monster invasion. Gather resources to make fighting weapons and survival tools. You must find and send a rescue signal at the end of your desperate survival.

Name: Across The Obelisk: The Wolf Wars
description: Travel back ten years and live the tale of the legendary Wolf Wars seen through the eyes of Magnus and Yogger with this new Story Pack, and unlock a new character, pet and new skins along the way.

Name: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Imperial Edition
description: Take back the city of Tertium Hive from hordes of bloodthirsty foes in this intense and brutal action shooter. Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is the new co-op focused experience from the award-winning team behind the Vermintide series.As Tertium falls, Rejects Will Rise.

Name: Batman™: Arkham Origins Blackgate - Deluxe Edition
description: Batman: Arkham Origins Blackgate - Deluxe Edition amplifies the 2.5-D game developed by Armature Studio with new maps, enemy encounters, difficulty levels, and batsuits, all with enhanced visuals. A companion game to Batman: Arkham Origins, players can continue the storyline of the console version and discover more details of the Dark...

Name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VI: Portugal Pack
description: This new content pack introduces João III as the leader of Portugal, the new Zombies Defense game mode, a new Map Type and two new World Wonders.

Name: Autobahn Police Simulator 3
description: Autobahn Police Simulator 3 lets you play as a rookie officer who just resumed their position after a serious car accident left them incapacitated for a while. Work diligently and take on missions to become a capable police officer and keep the autobahn safe.

Name: CityDriver
description: Driving realistically in a real city for the first time - driving fun & training with CityDriver! ViewApp's newest simulation offers you the opportunity to explore the streets of Munich with various cars.

Name: The Outer Worlds: Spacer's Choice Edition
description: The Outer Worlds: Spacer’s Choice Edition is the ultimate way to play the award-winning RPG from Obsidian Entertainment and Private Division. Including the base game and all DLC, this remastered masterpiece is the absolute best version of The Outer Worlds.

Name: Total War: WARHAMMER - Chaos Warriors
description: The Chaos Warriors Race Pack brings a new race with its own new Legendary Lords, units, mounts, items, quest chains and mechanics to Total War™: WARHAMMER®.

Name: Hero's Land
Tags: ['PvP', 'Survival', 'MOBA', 'Open World', 'Free to Play', 'MMORPG', 'CRPG', 'Tactical RPG', 'Exploration', '2D Platformer', 'Roguelite', 'Fishing', 'Action RPG', 'Action-Adventure', 'RPG', 'Top-Down', 'Cute', 'Action', 'Stylized', 'Building']
description: HERO'S LAND is an online multiplayer PVP survival game. You lose everything upon death, so survival is the key! A variety of heroes are for you to choose from. You can go solo or gather a team to fight dangerous monsters and cunning enemies. Beat your enemies and get to the top of the leaderboard!

Name: Cube World
Tags: ['Open World', 'Adventure', 'Multiplayer', 'RPG', 'Voxel', 'Exploration', 'Indie', 'Online Co-Op', 'Fantasy', 'Third Person', 'Co-op', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Singleplayer', 'Procedural Generation', 'Crafting', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Action RPG', 'Sandbox', 'Survival', 'Walking Simulator']
description: Cube World is a voxel-based action RPG with a focus on exploration. It takes place in a procedurally generated fantasy world made up entirely of cubes.

Name: Two Point Campus: School Spirits
description: Tackle a paranormal pest problem, learn what it means to be dead, and help those looking for a new lease on the afterlife.

Name: RPG Maker MZ - MV Trinity Resource Pack
Tags: ['RPG', 'Game Development', 'RPGMaker', 'Anime', 'Design & Illustration', 'Web Publishing', 'JRPG', '2D', 'Party-Based RPG', 'Singleplayer', 'Top-Down', 'Pixel Graphics', 'Education', 'Software', 'Fantasy', 'Story Rich', 'Magic', 'MMORPG']
description: Graphic assets from RPG Maker MV Trinity is now available for RPG Maker MZ! Create a super size map with this super size asset pack!

Name: Alone in the Dark (2008)
Tags: ['Adventure', 'Action', 'Horror', 'Survival Horror', 'Atmospheric', 'Great Soundtrack', 'Open World', 'Singleplayer', 'FPS', 'Story Rich', 'First-Person', 'Psychological Horror', 'Third Person', 'Survival', 'Lovecraftian', 'Cult Classic', 'Realistic', 'Cinematic', 'Crafting', 'Choices Matter']
description: The game that started the popular survival horror genre returns better than ever! Players control Edward Carnby, the main character from the original Alone in the Dark, on a thrilling journey through a dark and terrifying re-creation of New York's Central Park where Carnby must discover the truth behind a dark conspiracy.

Name: The Walking Dead Onslaught
description: There’s no rest when survival is on the line. Step into AMC’s The Walking Dead and prepare for an onslaught of walkers as you assume the roles of your favorite characters from the show, and confront the horrors and humanity of this apocalyptic new world.

Name: Succubus - Red Goddess
description: A huge expansion for Succubus, which expands the plot of the game and allows you to play as the Red Goddess!

Name: Loop8: Summer of Gods
Tags: ['RPG', 'JRPG', 'Anime', 'Interactive Fiction', 'Conversation', 'Visual Novel', 'Choices Matter', 'Narrative', 'Time Manipulation', 'Mythology', 'Story Rich', 'Singleplayer', 'Time Management', 'Fantasy', 'Dating Sim', 'Drama', 'Dark', 'Atmospheric', 'Emotional', 'Surreal']
description: Your choices shape the world in this coming-of-age RPG. As a new arrival in a 1980s rural Japanese town with a mysterious ability to loop time, your every decision and relationship will affect the outcome of battles against the invading Kegai.

Name: Heroes of Hammerwatch: Moon Temple
description: Moon Temple, an ancient cold and chilly place of worship, holds a powerful orb that foul invaders are trying to steal for their own sinister purpose.

Name: Uncharted Waters Origin
Tags: ['RPG', 'Simulation', 'Strategy', 'MMORPG', 'Turn-Based Strategy', 'Massively Multiplayer', 'Tactical RPG', 'Adventure', 'Online Co-Op', 'Turn-Based Tactics', 'Sailing', '3D', 'Third Person', 'Management', 'Economy', 'Historical', 'Open World', 'PvE', 'PvP', 'Trading']
description: Commemorating 30 years of the Uncharted Waters seriesSail through the vast oceans, massive worlds and contentsOpen world exploration RPG Uncharted Waters Origin

Name: Naval Action - San Pedro
description: San Pedro is a premium consumable Rayo Class second rate ship of the line built in Havana by Pedro de Torres.

Name: Fantasy Kingdom Simulator
description: Fantasy Kingdom Simulator transports you into a medieval realm where you reign as King of four villages, and your duty is to help them grow and blossom into fully developed cities. You'll be making meaningful choices, important decisions and face the consequences if you plan poorly.

Name: Call to Arms - Season Pass
description: The Ultimate Edition of Call to Arms includes the Deluxe Edition and Season Pass!

Name: Pajama Sam 4: Life Is Rough When You Lose Your Stuff!
description: Pajama Sam sets off on a series of adventures in search of his lost comic book, looking for lost socks in Agitator Lake, rounding up dust bunnies at the Dust Bunny Corral, exploring the Spilled Soda Swamp and much more.

Name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VI: Maya & Gran Colombia Pack
description: This new content pack introduces the Maya civilization, led Lady Six Sky, and the Gran Colombia civilization, led by Simón Bolívar. Also included is the new Apocalypse game mode as well as new City-States, Resources, and Natural Wonders.

Name: Borderlands 3: Retro Cosmetic Pack
description: The Retro Cosmetic Pack includes a Retro Vault Hunter head and skin, Echo Device skin, and weapon skin. This content is included in the Borderlands 3 Deluxe Edition and Super Deluxe Edition.

Name: Tomb Raider: Tomb of the Lost Adventurer
description: Explore the final resting place of an intrepid adventurer, and solve a puzzle involving a crashed plane to claim your reward (single player map).

Name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VI: Persia and Macedon Civilization & Scenario Pack
description: Alexander leads Macedon and Cyrus leads Persia in Sid Meier’s Civilization VI! Macedon’s abilities will let you conquer the whole world, and Persia can grow rich and cultured, or launch surprise invasions with incredible ease.

Name: Crusader Kings III: Friends & Foes
description: Beware, ruler - tread carefully with those you call friend or enemy; they are two sides of the same coin. Your relationships matter more than ever, and with Crusader Kings III: Friends & Foes, witness those closest to you come alive in the most intimate detail.

Name: The Sims™ 4 My First Pet Stuff
Tags: ['Simulation', 'Character Customization', 'Singleplayer', 'Action', 'Classic', 'Adventure', 'Casual', 'Building', 'Choose Your Own Adventure', 'Dating Sim', 'Life Sim']
description: Welcome home a new small animal and show love for Cats and Dogs with The Sims™ 4 My First Pet Stuff.*
